actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to eliminate the survivorship reduction during periods of nonmarriage of certain annuitants.

summary.text: Provides that Federal employees and Members of Congress who marry after retirement and who elect to receive a reduced annuity at such time shall have the reduction restored during any period of non-marriage which occurs after retirement. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8559(j)(2))

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to eliminate the survivorship reduction during periods of nonmarriage of certain annuitants.
